title: Prometheus
review: I didn't really want to watch this film in October, because I don't think it's great, but I did it anyway just so I can write about the medi-bot scene: a character needs a to perform an emergency medical procedure, and it is totally worth watching the rest of this mediocre movie to see it. It grosses me out in just the right way and is really stressful. Michael Fassbender is pretty good in this. Script is codswallop.
